00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.exception.DateParseException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 
00009 import java.sql.Connection;
00010 import java.text.ParseException;
00011 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00012 import java.util.Date;
00013 
00014 public class H2Database extends HsqlDatabase {
00015 
00016     public String getProductName() {
00017         return "H2 Database";
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getTypeName() {
00021         return "h2";
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00025         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:h2")) {
00026             return "org.h2.Driver";
00027         }
00028         return null;
00029     }
00030 
00031 
00032     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00033         return "H2".equals(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00034     }
00035 
00036     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00037         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_SCHEMA = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "' AND IS_GENERATED=FALSE");
00038     }
00039

00065 
00066     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00067         return false;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00071         return super.getViewDefinition(schemaName, name).replaceFirst(".*?\n", ""); //h2 returns "create view....as\nselect
00072     }
00073 
00074     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00075         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT VIEW_DEFINITION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_NAME = '" + name + "' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='"+convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName)+"'");
00076     }
00077 
00078     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00079         if (defaultValue != null && defaultValue instanceof String) {
00080             if (StringUtils.trimToEmpty(((String) defaultValue)).startsWith("(NEXT VALUE FOR PUBLIC.SYSTEM_SEQUENCE_")) {
00081                 return null;
00082             }
00083             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(((String) defaultValue)) == null) {
00084                 return null;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00088     }
00089 
00090     protected Date parseDate(String dateAsString) throws DateParseException {
00091         try {
00092             if (dateAsString.indexOf(' ') > 0) {
00093                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS").parse(dateAsString);
00094             } else {
00095                 if (dateAsString.indexOf(':') > 0) {
00096                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00097                 } else {
00098                     return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(dateAsString);
00099                 }
00100             }
00101         } catch (ParseException e) {
00102             throw new DateParseException(dateAsString);
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     public String getDateTimeType() {
00107         return "TIMESTAMP";
00108     }
00109 }
